verses.verse: All the commandments <S%H4687><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%> shall you observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%>, that you may live <S%H2421><s%>, and multiply <S%H7235><s%>, and go in <S%H935><s%> and possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> unto your fathers <S%H1><s%>.

And you shall remember <S%H2142><s%> all the way <S%H1870><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> led <S%H3212><s%> you these forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, to humble <S%H6031><s%> you <S%H5254><s%>, and to prove you <S%H3045><s%>, to know what was in your heart <S%H3824><s%>, whether you would keep <S%H8104><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%>, or no.

And he humbled <S%H6031><s%> you <S%H7456><s%>, and allowed you to hunger, and fed <S%H398><s%> you with manna <S%H4478><s%>, which you knew <S%H3045><s%> not <S%H1><s%>, neither did your fathers know <S%H3045><s%>; that he might make you know <S%H3045><s%> that man <S%H120><s%> does not live <S%H2421><s%> by bread <S%H3899><s%> only <S%H905><s%>, but by every word that proceeds <S%H4161><s%> out of the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> does man <S%H120><s%> live <S%H2421><s%>.
Your clothes <S%H8071><s%> grew not old <S%H1086><s%> upon you <S%H7272><s%>, neither did your foot swell <S%H1216><s%>, these forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>.

You shall also consider <S%H3045><s%> in <S%H5973><s%> your heart <S%H3824><s%>, that <S%H376><s%>, as a man chastens <S%H3256><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, so the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> chastens you <S%H3256><s%>.
Therefore you shall keep <S%H8104><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, to walk <S%H3212><s%> in his ways <S%H1870><s%>, and to fear him <S%H3372><s%>.

For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> brings <S%H935><s%> you into a good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%>, a land <S%H776><s%> of brooks <S%H5158><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%>, of fountains <S%H5869><s%> and depths <S%H8415><s%> that spring out <S%H3318><s%> of valleys <S%H1237><s%> and hills <S%H2022><s%>;

A land <S%H776><s%> of wheat <S%H2406><s%>, and barley <S%H8184><s%>, and vines <S%H1612><s%>, and fig trees <S%H8384><s%>, and pomegranates <S%H7416><s%>; a land <S%H776><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%> olive <S%H2132><s%>, and honey <S%H1706><s%>;

A land <S%H776><s%> where <S%H834><s%> you shall eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> outside <S%H3808><s%> scarceness <S%H4544><s%>, you shall not lack <S%H2637><s%> any thing in it <S%H776><s%>; a land whose stones <S%H68><s%> are iron <S%H1270><s%>, and out of whose hills <S%H2042><s%> you may dig <S%H2672><s%> brass <S%H5178><s%>.

When you have eaten <S%H398><s%> and are full <S%H7646><s%>, then you shall bless <S%H1288><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> for the good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> which he has given you <S%H5414><s%>.

Beware <S%H8104><s%> that you forget <S%H7911><s%> not the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, in not keeping <S%H8104><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%>, and his judgments <S%H4941><s%>, and his statutes <S%H2708><s%>, which I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%>:
Lest when you have eaten <S%H398><s%> and are full <S%H7646><s%>, and have built <S%H1129><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> houses <S%H1004><s%>, and lived in them <S%H3427><s%>;

And when your herds <S%H1241><s%> and your flocks <S%H6629><s%> multiply <S%H7235><s%>, and your silver <S%H3701><s%> and your gold <S%H2091><s%> is multiplied <S%H7235><s%>, and all that you have is multiplied <S%H7235><s%>;

Then your heart <S%H3824><s%> be lifted up <S%H7311><s%>, and you forget <S%H7911><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, which brought you forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, from the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondage <S%H5650><s%>;

Who led <S%H3212><s%> you through that great <S%H1419><s%> and terrible <S%H3372><s%> wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, where were fiery <S%H8314><s%> serpents <S%H5175><s%>, and scorpions <S%H6137><s%>, and drought <S%H6774><s%>, where there was no water <S%H4325><s%>; who brought you forth <S%H3318><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> out of the rock <S%H6697><s%> of flint <S%H2496><s%>;

Who fed <S%H398><s%> you in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> with manna <S%H4478><s%>, which your fathers <S%H1><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> not <S%H6031><s%>, that he might humble you <S%H5254><s%>, and that he might prove you <S%H3190><s%>, to do you good at your latter end <S%H319><s%>;
And you say <S%H559><s%> in your heart <S%H3824><s%>, My power <S%H3581><s%> and the might <S%H6108><s%> of my hand <S%H3027><s%> has gotten <S%H6213><s%> me this wealth <S%H2428><s%>.

But you shall remember <S%H2142><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>: for it is he that gives <S%H5414><s%> you power <S%H3581><s%> to get <S%H6213><s%> wealth <S%H2428><s%>, that he may establish <S%H6965><s%> his covenant <S%H1285><s%> which he swore <S%H7650><s%> unto your fathers <S%H1><s%>, as it is this day <S%H3117><s%>.

And it shall be <S%H7911><s%>, if you do at all forget <S%H7911><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, and walk <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>, and serve <S%H5647><s%> them <S%H7812><s%>, and worship them <S%H5749><s%>, I testify against you this day <S%H3117><s%> that you shall surely <S%H6><s%> perish <S%H6><s%>.

As the nations <S%H1471><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> destroys <S%H6><s%> before your face <S%H6440><s%>, so shall you perish <S%H6><s%>; because <S%H6118><s%> you would not be obedient <S%H8085><s%> unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.
